scripts.internal_server: cross-env PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w src --exec "babel-node src/internal_server.js  "
scripts.debug: cross-env PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w src src/internal_server.js --exec "babel-node --inspect  src/internal_server.js  "
scripts.prod_build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build
scripts.pm2: concurrently --kill-others  cross-env NODE_ENV=development  pm2 start  --max-memory-restart 850M "babel-node src/internal_server.js "  "npm run client"
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test npm run build && mocha --require babel-core/register --timeout=10000000
scripts.complete-build: concurrently  "babel src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Core --source-maps false " "babel HrManagement/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/HrManagement --source-maps false" "babel DocumentManagement/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/DocumentManagement --source-maps false" "babel MasterSettings/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/MasterSettings --source-maps false" "babel Billing/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Billing --source-maps false" "babel FrontDesk/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/FrontDesk --source-maps false" "babel Radiology/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Radiology --source-maps false" "babel Laboratory/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Laboratory --source-maps false" "babel Pharmacy/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Pharmacy --source-maps false" "babel Inventory/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Inventory --source-maps false" "babel Procurement/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Procurement --source-maps false" "babel AlgaehReporting/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/AlgaehReporting --source-maps false" "babel Insurance/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Insurance --source-maps false" "babel ClinicalDesk/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/ClinicalDesk --source-maps false" "babel Finanace/src -s -D -d ../algaeh_erp_live/Finanace --source-maps false"
scripts.start: cross-env PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=production pm2 start  -i 4 internal_server.js
